about_the_game:
Genre: Shooter Arena

Synopsis:
Dive into the vibrant and futuristic world of Bump, a shooter arena game set in a cyberpunk universe. Explore dazzling arenas filled with neon lights and advanced technology, where danger and opportunities lurk around every corner.

Gameplay:
In Bump, players face off in dynamic arenas using a diverse arsenal of skills. Armed with normal and charged shots, they can move with agility through powerful jumps, rapid dashes, and even slow down time with bullet time abilities. Players can also climb walls to gain an advantage over their opponents. The action is fast-paced, intense, and requires sharp reflexes and smart strategies to dominate the battlefield.

Key Features:

Emergent mechanics:
  • Players can utilize the environment and special abilities to create unique and unpredictable strategies.
  • Cyberpunk universe: Immerse yourself in a rich and stylized setting, with colorful arenas and futuristic design elements.
  • Cartoon visual style: Enjoy vibrant and distinctive graphics that add a unique and captivating touch to the shooter arena genre.
  • Varied skills: Combine normal and charged shots with acrobatic movements to outplay your opponents.
  • Competitive multiplayer: Face off against players from around the world and climb the leaderboards to become the ultimate champion of Bump.
  • Target Audience:
  • Bump is designed for all types of players, whether beginners or experts, who love shooter arenas and are fascinated by the cyberpunk universe. If you're looking for a game that combines precise shooting mechanics with fluid and strategic movements in a visually captivating setting, Bump is the game for you.

Copyright and Brand Information

Copyright Notice
© 2024 TwinBrains Studio. All Rights Reserved.

Game Title

Studio
TwinBrains Studio™ is a trademark of TwinBrains Studio.

Intellectual Property
All content within the game BUMP, including but not limited to, the game code, visual designs, graphics, characters, storylines, dialogues, sound effects, music, and any other assets, are the exclusive property of TwinBrains Studio. Unauthorized use, reproduction, or distribution of any game content without prior written consent from TwinBrains Studio is strictly prohibited.

Trademark
BUMP and TwinBrains Studio names, logos, and associated trademarks are protected under trademark law. Any unauthorized use of these trademarks, including but not limited to, misuse in a manner that is likely to cause confusion or mislead customers, is strictly prohibited.

User-Generated Content
Users may have the ability to create and share content within BUMP. TwinBrains Studio retains the right to use, modify, and distribute any user-generated content within the game as part of its services. By creating or sharing content, users grant TwinBrains Studio a non-exclusive, transferable, sub-licensable, royalty-free, worldwide license to use their content.

Content Creators and Community Sharing
We encourage and support content creators who wish to share videos, livestreams, screenshots, and other content related to BUMP. You are welcome to create and share content, provided that:
You do not claim any part of our game (including assets, logos, and trademarks) as your own.
You clearly attribute BUMP and TwinBrains Studio in your content.
Your content is not used for commercial purposes without our explicit permission, except as part of platforms like YouTube, Twitch, or similar, where ad revenue and donations are standard practice.
You comply with our Community Guidelines and do not promote any illegal activities or hate speech.

Reporting Infringement
If you believe that any content within BUMP infringes upon your intellectual property rights, please contact us immediately at bump.contact.tbs@gmail.com. We will promptly investigate and take necessary actions to resolve any claims of infringement.

Contact Information
For any questions or further information regarding copyright and trademarks, please contact:
bump.contact.tbs@gmail.com
name: Bump

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: Non

short_description: Engage in fast-paced cyberpunk multiplayer arena combat. Utilize normal/charged shots, jumps, dashes, bullet time, and wall climbing for strategic advantage to push your enemies out of the arena and win the game.
